attributes.action: Withdraw Government Support For Adverts That Make False Links Between Games and Bad Health
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
http://uk.videogames.games.yahoo.com/blog/article/1970/

The advert disscused on this site is a government backed one that makes false claims that there is a link between playing video games and early death, i have seen no evidence that they even cause health problems, yet alone early death, so please remove your backing for this advert, immediatley.

rejection.details:
Hi Rory

We can't include a petition which has a link to a website. 

If you take out the link, we can approve your petition for the site.

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
